comment:
Extracted Variables:
- Let x be the number of servings of health supplement A
- Let y be the number of servings of health supplement B

Extracted Constraints:
- 30x + 60y \geq 400 (Minimum daily requirement of Calcium)
- 50x + 10y \geq 50 (Minimum daily requirement of Magnesium)
- x \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for servings of health supplement A)
- y \geq 0 (Non-negativity constraint for servings of health supplement B)

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize 14x + 25y (Minimize the daily cost of the health supplements)
